name: Timeanddate.com
description: Use our API Services to tap into timeanddate.com's database and integrate our data into your applications. timeanddate.com is the leading website in its field and provides accurate and reliable information on local times worldwide, time zones, holidays, dialing codes, sun/moon rise, and much more.
